statements: DELETE FROM email_campaign_data WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_recipients > 10000;
DELETE FROM email_campaign_data WHERE total_recipients >= 1000 AND click_rate >= 0.05;
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 123 AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_rate > 5.00 AND revenue_generated >= 1000.00
DELETE FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE campaign_id = 200 AND recipient_id = 150;
DELETE FROM CampaignAnalytics WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND analytics_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CampaignTags WHERE tag_id = 1 AND campaign_id = 100;
DELETE FROM CampaignContacts WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
